title: A nearly-forgotten pioneer, this mountaineer served as the president of the Geographical Society of Philadelphia. ...
text: ( Source : Historical Society of Pennsylvania ) Answer : Henry Grier Bryant Henry Grier Bryant was born in Allegheny, PA in 1859, but lived much of his life in Philadelphia . A graduate of Princeton and University of Pennsylvania Law School ,
